text: The TV business is uglier than most things. It is normally perceived as some kind of cruel and shallow money trench through the heart of the journalism industry, a long plastic hallway where thieves and pimps run free and good men die like dogs, for no good reason.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

text: An actress is not a machine, but they treat you like a machine. A money machine.
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Politics has become so expensive that it takes a lot of money even to be defeated.
author: Will Rogers

text: The use of money is all the advantage there is in having it.
author: Benjamin Franklin
